show_name: Ai to Yūki no Pig Girl Tonde Būrin (TV)
other_title: La ragazza maiale del coraggio e dell'amore, Buurin volante! (Italian)
Tonde Buurin, Pig Girl of Love and Courage
愛と勇気のピッグガール　とんでぶーりん (Japanese)
plot: A girl gets the ability to turn into a pig with special strength and the ability to fly as a punishment. Now she has to help people in her city and so earn points in order to loose the ability to turn into superpig and become a 'normal' girl again.
opening_theme: "愛はカッコわるい (Ai wa Kakkowarui)" by Parquets
ending_theme: "ぶーりん あ・ら・もーど (Būrin a la Mode)" by Parquets
